results.title: Long-term use of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors is associated with decreased incidence of advanced adenomatous colon polyps.
results.text_hl: GOAL: The aim of our study was to determine how long-term use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ influences the development of advanced @<m>DISEASE_Adenomatous_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018256 @@@adenomatous polyps@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Adenomatous_Polyps</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018256 @@@APs@@@).

citations.NLM: Kedika R, Patel M, Pena Sahdala HN, Mahgoub A, Cipher D, Siddiqui AA. Long-term use of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors is associated with decreased incidence of advanced adenomatous colon polyps. J Clin Gastroenterol. 2011 Feb;45(2):e12-6. PMID: 20697294
